医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
运动的时间、类型和频率是 2 型糖尿病最佳血糖控制的关键组成部分运动在控制 2 型糖尿病中发挥着至关重要的作用，可以带来改善血糖控制等潜在益处。本研究探讨了运动建议及其对饮食、药物和行为因素的影响，以实现最佳的糖尿病护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Timing-type-and-Frequency-of-exercise-are-crucial-components-for-optimal-glycemic-control-in-type-2-diabetes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Timing-type-and-Frequency-of-exercise-are-crucial-components-for-optimal-glycemic-control-in-type-2-diabetes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cb1e4b6-3dfa-4639-993c-6f2355ded28c Wed, 05 Jul 2023 21:04:00 -0400 Timing, type, and frequency of exercise are crucial components for optimal glycemic control in type 2 diabetes
发现新蛋白质可帮助黑色素瘤逃避免疫系统桑福德伯纳姆普雷比斯学院的新研究有助于解释黑色素瘤如何逃避免疫系统，并可能指导该疾病未来疗法的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New- Protein-found-to-help-melanoma-evade-the-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New- Protein-found-to-help-melanoma-evade-the-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162d1017-ee70-4dee-a379-a6d82df3a510 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 20:48:09 -0400 New protein found to help melanoma evade the immune system
TBI 相关抑郁症可能是一种独特的疾病由麻省总医院布莱根妇女医院 (Brigham and Women's Hospital)（麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员）的 Shan Siddiqi 医学博士领导的一项新研究表明，创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 后的抑郁症可能是一种临床上独特的疾病，而不是传统的重度抑郁症。对患者治疗有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/TBI-linked-depression-may-be-a-distinct-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/TBI-linked-depression-may-be-a-distinct-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=873e0ec5-1dc3-4855-9185-c4d19e732443 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 20:39:33 -0400 TBI-associated depression may be a distinct disorder
新研究强调缺乏精神卫生保健的覆盖范围和获取途径随着对精神卫生保健的需求不断增加，一项新的研究发现，近三分之二的 Medicare Advantage 精神科医生网络中的精神科医生数量不足特定服务区域内所有精神科医生的 25%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-study-highlights-lack-of-coverage-and-access-to-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-study-highlights-lack-of-coverage-and-access-to-mental-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a086c994-3a09-48e4-837b-83bea60379e1 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 20:31:28 -0400 New study highlights lack of coverage and access to mental health care
重大协议使突破性的新癌症治疗方法更接近患者随着政府与 BioNTech SE 签署一项重要协议，突破性的新癌症治疗方法又向前迈进了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Major-agreement-moves-ground-writing-new-cancer-treatments-a-step-closer-to-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Major-agreement-moves-ground-writing-new-cancer-treatments-a-step-closer-to-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad56d9e1-61a4-49c4-9ac1-53a88325a667 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 20:17:12 -0400 Major agreement moves ground-breaking new cancer treatments a step closer to patients
疾病预防控制中心将减少各州儿童疫苗接种计划的资金根据《KFF 健康新闻》获得的一封机构电子邮件，疾病控制与预防中心正在减少对各州儿童疫苗接种项目的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/CDC-to-reduce-funding-for-statese28099-child-vaccination-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/CDC-to-reduce-funding-for-statese28099-child-vaccination-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55c4d6d4-342e-446c-8ba3-50343c07cc39 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 20:10:49 -0400 CDC to reduce funding for states’ child vaccination programs
研究发现医用大麻法对阿片类药物处方没有影响根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的政策分析，允许使用医用大麻的州法律并没有减少阿片类药物或其他慢性非癌症疼痛疗法的处方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Medical-cannabis-laws-have-no-effect-on-opioid-prescriptions-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Medical-cannabis-laws-have-no-effect-on-opioid-prescriptions-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8182d264-9871-4cf5-b256-bd93ee092a24 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:36:00 -0400 Medical cannabis laws have no effect on opioid prescriptions, study finds
研究发现，经常吸食大麻的人更容易出现术后并发症根据 UTHealth Houston 的研究人员今天在《美国医学会杂志》杂志上发表的一项研究，经常吸食大麻的人在手术前、手术期间和手术后出现并发症的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Regular-cannabis-users-more-likely-to-experience-postoperative-complications-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Regular-cannabis-users-more-likely-to-experience-postoperative-complications-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee46017-333c-4edb-8aca-f31aa0d2e256 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:33:24 -0400 Regular cannabis users more likely to experience postoperative complications, study finds
新的血液测试可以诊断胆汁酸腹泻大多数人在一生中的某个阶段都曾遭受过肠道感染或食物中毒，迫使他们呆在靠近浴室的地方。这是非常不舒服的。不过，大多数时候，一切都过去得很快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-blood-test-could-diagnose-bile-acid-diarrea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/New-blood-test-could-diagnose-bile-acid-diarrea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df8086dd-659d-4849-8c36-43a206a5815b Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:20:08 -0400 New blood test could diagnose bile acid diarrhea
研究揭示了一个人如何记住童年虐待或忽视的经历会影响未来的情绪障碍伦敦国王学院和纽约城市大学精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 今天（7 月 5 日星期三）在《美国医学会杂志精神病学》上发表的新研究发现，童年虐待和/或忽视的记忆和处理方式对以后心理健康的影响比经历本身更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-reveals-how-a-person-remembers-experiences-of-childhood-abuse-or-neglect-can-impact-future-emotional-disorders。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-reveals-how-a-person-remembers-experiences-of-childhood-abuse-or-neglect-can-impact-future-emotional-disorders。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64f2682b-242b-4d35-8e8d-288657394049 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 15:12:05 -0400 Study reveals how a person remembers experiences of childhood abuse or neglect can impact future emotional disorders
